about_the_game:
STARUSTER is a musical and rhythmic experience in which you will face a challenge that will test your skills and reflexes. We invite you to dive into our neon and sound-filled world in which your main objective is to collect all the arrows to the rhythm of the music, but avoiding catching the spikeballs. Any mistake in this dynamic will make you lose the game instantly.



Show your skills and manage to beat all the levels!

Outstanding Features


  • Musical and rhythmic gameplay: Immerse yourself in the melody as you challenge your skills.
  • Constant challenge: Increasingly complex patterns will test your reflexes and accuracy.
  • Collect the arrows: Use the mouse to catch all the arrows at the right time.
  • Avoid the spikeballs: Watch out for the pointy balls, any mistake will be fatal.
  • High scores: Compete against your friends to get the highest score.

Download the Demo Now and Show Your Skills!
detailed_description:
STARUSTER is a musical and rhythmic experience in which you will face a challenge that will test your skills and reflexes. We invite you to dive into our neon and sound-filled world in which your main objective is to collect all the arrows to the rhythm of the music, but avoiding catching the spikeballs. Any mistake in this dynamic will make you lose the game instantly.



Show your skills and manage to beat all the levels!

Outstanding Features


  • Musical and rhythmic gameplay: Immerse yourself in the melody as you challenge your skills.
  • Constant challenge: Increasingly complex patterns will test your reflexes and accuracy.
  • Collect the arrows: Use the mouse to catch all the arrows at the right time.
  • Avoid the spikeballs: Watch out for the pointy balls, any mistake will be fatal.
  • High scores: Compete against your friends to get the highest score.

Download the Demo Now and Show Your Skills!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux + SteamOS 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2.40GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 240 gts 512mb
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2.40GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 240 gts 512mb
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

name: STARDUSTER

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2.40GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 240 gts 512mb
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: STARDUSTER is a musical and arcade game wrapped in an abstract aesthetic with neon lights designed for players who enjoy difficult challenges and seek to push their own limits.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Catalan, Basque, Galician
